mapper.select:
select boards.*, rownum from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum,b.eno, b.esubject, b.etype, b.edate, b.ecnt, a.filename as fn from (select @rownum:=0) as rownum ,boards as b left join boards_attach as a on a.eno=b.eno
where esubject like concat ('%' ,#{keyword}, '%')
group by eno order by eno desc ) boards
where rownum > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select count(*) from boards
where esubject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update boards set esubject = #{esubject}, econtent = #{econtent}, edate = #{edate}, estyle = #{estyle}, etype = #{etype}, eaddress = #{eaddress} where eno = #{eno}
mapper.select: select filename from boards_attach where eno=#{eno}
mapper.update: update boards set ecnt = ecnt + 1 where eno = #{eno};
